title: [1.7]SuperHeroes Mod——超级英雄
txt_content:
作者的介绍Have you every faced a creeper and blown up? Or found yourself lost in a jungle and you did not know your way home? Or even have needed a quick escape from a battle? Well with the Superheroes Unlimited Mod now you can! You're born to be a hero so suit up, the journey is just beginning.你有过被苦力怕扣脸的经历吗，或是在树林中找不到回去的路，再或是需要很快地逃离战区？你现在可以使用这个超级英雄mod，因为你生来就是个当英雄的料。现在，你的故事只不过才开始而已

游戏截图
